item.title: Fixing the Tailwheel
item.description: Follow the careful repair and adjustment of a tailwheel to keep an aircraft rolling smoothly and safely. What part of the process interests you most?

media:content.media:title: Fixing the Tailwheel
media:content.media:description: Follow the careful repair and adjustment of a tailwheel to keep an aircraft rolling smoothly and safely. What part of the process interests you most?

item.title: 1989 AM General Humvee Overview
item.description: A tour of a 1989 AM General HMMWV, exploring its design, features, and military origins that shaped the iconic H1 platform. What stands out most about this classic Humvee?

item.title: The Sad Story of the “Silver Bullet”
item.description: A once-promising aircraft nicknamed the “Silver Bullet” faces an unexpected and unfortunate outcome, prompting a closer look at what went wrong. Can it ever be restored?

item.title: Unboxing My Priciest Online Engine Purchase
item.description: A brand-new engine ordered online finally arrives, and the unboxing reveals its condition, components, and build quality. Was it worth the high price?

item.title: Will the Blue Tarp Airplane Start?
item.description: A long-abandoned airplane hidden under a blue tarp is inspected to see if it can start and qualify for a “buy-it-if-it-starts” deal. What surprises are waiting under the cover?

item.title: Can This Plane Fly 893 Miles Home?
item.description: A long-idle airplane is inspected, tested, and prepped to see if it can safely complete an 893-mile journey. Will it be ready for the flight home?

item.title: Abandoned Flying Boat Takes Its First Splash
item.description: A restored flying boat returns to the water for the first time after years of neglect, with careful checks to ensure stability and function. How will it handle its first splash back?

item.title: Flying One of GA’s Most Complex Aircraft
item.description: A deep dive into operating a highly complex general aviation aircraft, from cockpit systems to handling techniques. What makes this plane such a challenge to fly?

item.title: Inside H1 Hummer!
item.description: A closer look at the interior of an H1 Hummer, exploring its design, layout, and unique features that set it apart from other vehicles. Which detail stands out to you?

item.title: Will This Airplane Start and Fly 893 Miles Home?
item.description: A long-sitting airplane is inspected, tested, and prepped to see if it can safely make an 893-mile flight home. Will it be ready for the journey?

item.title: Unboxing My $19K Plane Engine Like a Kid on Christmas!
item.description: A pilot opens a newly purchased aircraft engine, reviewing its condition, components, and what it means for the upcoming rebuild. What surprises are inside?

item.title: Taking an Older Luxury RV to Camping World
item.description: A visit to Camping World with a well-used luxury RV to assess repairs, upgrades, and maintenance needs. What will the inspection uncover?

item.title: Just Got Here, and I’m Already Overwhelmed
item.description: A first look at a massive aviation or travel event where the scale, sounds, and sights immediately take over. What would catch your attention first?

item.title: Maintaining a Budget-Friendly Airplane
item.description: A clear look at the real costs, upkeep routines, and inspections required to safely operate an older aircraft. Is a budget airplane truly affordable long-term?

item.title: Exploring Aviation Legends
item.description: A tour through iconic aircraft that shaped aviation history, highlighting their design, impact, and lasting stories. Which legend stands out to you?

item.title: Starting a 250-mph Museum Airplane
item.description: A team examines whether a high-speed museum aircraft can start and operate after years on display.

item.title: Starting a Plane After Seven Years Idle
item.description: A careful attempt to start an aircraft that hasn’t run in years, covering the inspection steps, safety checks, and what happens when the engine finally turns over.

item.title: Exploring One of the World’s Largest Helicopters
item.description: A look at the size, design, and capabilities of the second-largest helicopter ever built.

item.title: Unexpected Find Inside a Cessna 310
item.description: A pilot shares an unusual discovery inside a Cessna 310 and walks through how it was identified and addressed.

item.title: Handling the Giantest RC Planes I’ve Ever Seen
item.description: A close look at operating and managing unusually large RC planes, highlighting control, setup, and safe handling techniques.
